Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Paul O'Brien to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
Summary: Authorizes Paul O'Brien, a village of East Aurora police officer, to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Paul O'Brien to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
